pullRequest.title: [audio] ported audio sinks from addons to core
pullRequest.bodyText:
I noticed that the openHAB 3 distro is lacking all audio (and thus also voice) support right now.
Looking into it, I concluded that the audio sinks should really be a core feature of the runtime and that they do not really fit being an "I/O" add-on (which we mainly have for exposing openHAB to external systems).
I therefore ported the code to the core.audio bundle, so that the sinks are by default available. I also cleaned the code on that occasion, removed Commons IO dependency, added NonNullByDefault annotations and applied our thread naming convention.
Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer kai@openhab.org
